dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is an excellent tool to expand specialized medical care providing better access for patients and lowering costs for their families The objective of this work was to evaluate the reliability of teleconsultation in pediatric cardiology with similar results to traditional consultation It can be a useful tool to upgrade technical skills among the staff involved and to improve the quality of life of patients and families
Revista portuguesa de cardiologia : orgão oficial da Sociedade Portuguesa de Cardiologia = Portuguese journal of cardiology : an official journal of the Portuguese Society of Cardiology
Five years of teleconsultation: experience of the Cardiology Department of Coimbra Pediatric Hospital.
